{"step_by_step_thinking": "Genioplasty is a type of surgery done on the chin. Both sliding genioplasty and augmentation genioplasty are performed on the chin, but they are different procedures. Sliding genioplasty involves cutting the chin bone and adjusting its position. Augmented genioplasty, on the other hand, is done to increase the size or improve the shape of the chin. This can be achieved by using bone grafts or silicone implants.", "answer_choice": "B. Bone grafts, C. Silicone implants"}
